title: Understanding gene interactions holds key to personalized medicine

title_detail.value: Understanding gene interactions holds key to personalized medicine

summary: Scientists outline a new framework for studying gene function -- not in isolation, gene by gene, but as a network, to understand how multiple genes and genetic background influence trait inheritance.

summary_detail.value: Scientists outline a new framework for studying gene function -- not in isolation, gene by gene, but as a network, to understand how multiple genes and genetic background influence trait inheritance.
